name: Tribrigade Revolt
text: Special Summon any number of your Beast, Beast-Warrior, and/or Winged Beast monsters that are banished and/or in your GY, but negate their effects (if any), and if you do, immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 "Tribrigade" Link Monster using only those monsters. You can only activate 1 "Tribrigade Revolt" per turn.
